title: Accessing the Secure System
description: This training module demonstrates how to access the secure system using the keypad, including how to handle and recover from entry errors.
transcript: then open. That's it. Any problems? steps.title: Initial Entry Attempt
steps.description: Begin by entering the four-digit access code on the keypad.

steps.title: Troubleshooting Lockout
steps.description: If the code is entered incorrectly (too fast, wrong numbers, etc.), the system may lock up.  If this happens, repeatedly press keys on the keypad until the screen goes blank and a red light blinks. This indicates the system has reset.

steps.title: Re-entry
steps.description: Once the system has reset (blank screen with a blinking red light), re-enter the four-digit access code.
